name: Logger
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Use `[p]help Logger` to see a list of available command(s) in this cog.

If you have any feedback, feel free to let us know at our discord.
 - https://dsc.gg/the-shit-show
short: Logger cog to aid in debugging and support.
description: Logger cog to aid in debugging and support. Logs events from every guild the bot is in to a set channel in the bot owner's guild.
end_user_data_statement: This cog logs information about users, guilds, and errors to a set logger channel for use with debugging and support purposes. This cog does not persistantly store data or metadata about users or guilds.
